data.name: Max E Saver
data.description: Max eSaver is a straightforward, fuss-free bonus savings option that simply does what it says: maximises your savings in an easy online account.

features.additionalValue: Interest reward for a deposit and no withdrawals.
Access via our award-winning banking app, Online Banking and telephone banking only.
Faster, Simpler ways to make payments
a new digital way to pre-authorise payments directly from your bank account.

constraints.additionalInfo: Available only for deposits up to $1 million.

fees.name: Overdrawn/over limit fees.
fees.additionalInfo: Each time your account is overdrawn or your credit limit is exceeded without authorisation, by more than $50.00.  On each subsequent debit transaction while your account is overdrawn or your credit limit has been exceeded, by more than $50.00.

fees.name: Dormant fee.
fees.additionalInfo: This fee may be charged in certain circumstances when your membership is redeemed by us due to non-activity of more than 12 months. The maximum annual fee that applies is $20.00

fees.name: Statement fees
fees.additionalInfo: Where you request monthly or ad-hoc statements.

fees.name: Auto transfer/BPAY dishonour fee.
fees.additionalInfo: Charged where there are insufficient funds in your account when the Auto Transfer or BPAY payment is due to be made.

fees.name: Cheque/direct debit honour /dishonour fee.
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when: We decide to honour your personal cheque for payment where there are insufficient funds in your account or the credit limit will be/has been exceeded.We dishonour payment of your personal cheque due to insufficient funds, payment stopped or the cheque is incorrectly completed (e.g. no signature).We decline a direct debit request due to insufficient funds.We decide to honour a direct debit request where there are insufficient funds in your account or the credit limit will be/has been exceeded.

depositRates.additionalValue: If a deposit is made during the month with no withdrawals, the bonus rate applies to the balance for that month.
depositRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily on the closing balance and credited on the last day of each month.
Interest is calculated daily on the closing balance and credited on the last day of each month.
